statements: UPDATE coaches SET coach_name='John Doe', certifications=['CPR', 'First Aid'] WHERE coach_id=1;

UPDATE coaches SET coach_name = 'John Doe', certifications = ARRAY['Level 1', 'Level 2'], training_schedules = '{"Monday": ["Morning", "Afternoon"]}', performance_evaluations = '{"Q1": "Good", "Q2": "Excellent"}' WHERE coach_id = 1;
